references: Our experiments are run with the NVIDIA Megatron English‚ÄìMany model111https://catalog.ngc.nvidia.com/orgs/nvidia/teams/nemo/models/megatronnmt_en_any_500m, a 500M parameter encoder-decoder model, which supports translating from English into 30 languages222The model was originally trained to support 32 languages, but we found that translating into Arabic and Slovak resulted in degenerate output. from 14 language families, listed in Table¬†1. references:
Results are reported in Table¬†3 and Figure¬†2.
We find that DPO task alignment increases all three neural quality metrics on both datasets for each of the 30 target languages supported by the Megatron EN-X model.
The nearly-universal444The only language that did not see universal improvements was Hindi, which regressed in BLEU for both datasets, despite improving in the three neural metrics (COMET, CometKiwi, and BLEURT). improvements for both FLORES+ and NTREX in all four automatic translation quality metrics (Table¬†3) provide strong evidence that DQO is a suitable task-alignment algorithm for the task of producing human-preferred translations.

S5.T4.1.caption: Names are bolded to highlight the DQO model‚Äôs increased ability to consistently transliterate names into Latvian orthography. Names that are incorrectly transliterated are in italics.
S5.T4.1.table:
Source The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.
Baseline Pirmās ekonomiskās reformas tika veiktas Deng Xiaoping vadībā.
DQO Pirmās ekonomiskās reformas tika veiktas Dena Sjaopina vadībā.
Source … that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits …
Baseline … ka OHA Carolyn Wilson bija nozagusi viņu drošības depozītus …
DQO … ka OHA darbiniece Karolīna Vilsona bija nozagusi viņu drošības depozītus …
Source However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
Baseline Tomēr avots, kas zina par izmeklēšanu, Minneapolis Star-Tribune pastāstīja, ka tas bija Louis Jourdain, 16 gadus vecs Red Lake cilts priekšsēdētāja Floida Jourdaina dēls.
DQO Tomēr avots, kas ir informēts par izmeklēšanu, Minneapolis Star-Tribune pastāstīja, ka tas bija Luiss Džordēns, 16 gadus vecs Red Lake cilts priekšsēdētāja Floida Džordēna dēls.
Source King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.
Baseline King Sejong bija ceturtais karalis no Joseon dinastijas un ir viens no visvairāk augstu vērtē.
DQO Karalis Sedžons bija ceturtais Džosona dinastijas karalis un ir viens no visaugstāk novērtētajiem.
references: However, manual inspection of translations before and after DQO revealed language-specific improvements in unrelated languages. In Latvian, for instance, foreign names are transliterated to match Latvian orthography and declined for grammatical case and gender, e.g. Klavinska (2021) report that George Clooney is translated as D≈æord≈æs Kl≈´nijs. While the baseline model applies this rule occasionally and inconsistently, the DQO model almost always produces the correct transliteration. Several examples are included in Table¬†4.

S5.T5.1.caption: , as annotated by professional human evaluators, with two different groupings: by severity and by whether the MQM subcategory is language specific or agnostic. NT stands for non-translation, i.e., a segment that cannot be construed as a translation of the source. Trivial refers to minor punctuation errors. This covers 100 randomly sampled English segments from the FLORES+ dataset, translated by the NVIDIA Megatron model before task alignment (baseline) and after it (DQO). The weighted MQM score follows  .
